actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for the disposition, by the Secretary of the Army, of certain easements which are no longer necessary for Federal navigation projects.

summary.text: Permits the disposition, by the Secretary of the Army, of easements along the Louisana- Texas Intracoastal Waterway considered to be no longer necessary for the Federal navigation projects governed by the Army Corps of Engineers.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the disposition, by the Secretary of the Army, of certain easements which are no longer necessary for Federal navigation projects.
